meanings.definition: Affected by alcohol to the extent of losing control of one's faculties or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The drunken man stumbled and fell on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her drunken actions at the party the next morning.
meanings.sent3: The drunken squirrel kept trying to climb the same tree over and over.
meanings.sent4: His drunken laughter echoed through the empty streets.
meanings.sent5: The image of the drunken sailor swaying on the ship was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Given to or marked by the consumption of alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The drunken group of friends laughed loudly at the bar.
meanings.sent2: Her drunken habits worried her family.
meanings.sent3: The drunken cat knocked over a glass of water with its tail.
meanings.sent4: The drunken sky seemed to swirl with colors at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the drunken man's breath was overpowering.

meanings.definition: Overcome or dominated by a strong feeling or emotion.
meanings.sent1: She was in a drunken state of happiness after receiving the good news.
meanings.sent2: His drunken love for her was evident in every gesture.
meanings.sent3: The drunken excitement in the room was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The drunken fear of failure paralyzed him.
meanings.sent5: The drunken joy of the children playing in the park was heartwarming.
